name: jobportal
description: A comprehensive job portal application structured as a monorepo, containing:

scripts.in: npm install --prefix StudentPortal && npm install --prefix AdminPortal && npm install --prefix Backend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix StudentPortal" "npm start --prefix AdminPortal" "npm start --prefix Backend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix StudentPortal" "npm run dev --prefix AdminPortal" "npm run dev --prefix Backend"
